name: SUNDAY DRIVE
description:
An intense 2-4 player showdown. Also everyone's a car. It's a car fighting game.

Controls:

  • Red car- Q
  • Blue car- P
  • Green car- J
  • Yellow car- F
  • Hit your friends head on to brake their car.
  • Avoid benches, trees, and the sides of ramps.
  • Press R to restart.

Credits:
